name: Fireball
description: A bright streak flashes to a point you choose, exploding into flames that deal 8d6 fire damage to creatures in a 20-foot radius.

name: Cure Wounds
description: A creature you touch regains hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

name: Shield
description: An invisible barrier of magical force grants +5 AC and negates magic missile until the start of your next turn.

name: Eldritch Blast
description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature, dealing 1d10 force damage; bolts scale with level.

name: Bless
description: Up to three creatures gain +1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws for the duration.

name: Hunter's Mark
description: You mark a creature, dealing an extra 1d6 damage on weapon attacks and gaining advantage on tracking it.

name: Mage Armor
description: Touching a willing creature surrounds it with protective magic, setting its AC to 13 + Dexterity modifier.

name: Spiritual Weapon
description: You create a floating spectral weapon that makes melee spell attacks as a bonus action, dealing 1d8 + modifier force damage.

name: Hex
description: You curse a creature for up to an hour, adding 1d6 necrotic damage to your attacks and giving it disadvantage on chosen ability checks.

name: Silvery Barbs
description: When a creature succeeds on an attack, ability check, or save, you impose disadvantage and grant advantage to another creature.

name: Spirit Guardians
description: Spectral guardians swirl around you dealing 3d8 radiant or necrotic damage to enemies in a 15-foot radius and halving their speed.

name: Swift Quiver
description: You transmute your quiver to produce endless ammunition and can make two extra ranged attacks each round.

name: Haste
description: Choose a willing creature; its speed doubles, gains +2 AC, advantage on Dex saves, and an extra action each turn.

name: Mass Cure Wounds
description: A wave of healing energy restores 3d8 + modifier hit points to up to six creatures in a 30-foot radius.

name: Hold Person
description: Choose a humanoid that must succeed on a Wisdom save or become paralyzed for the duration; higher slots affect more targets.

name: Wrathful Smite
description: The next time you hit with a melee weapon, the attack deals an extra 1d6 psychic damage and can frighten the target.

name: Magic Missile
description: Three glowing darts unerringly strike creatures you can see, each dealing 1d4 + 1 force damage with more darts at higher slots.

name: Detect Magic
description: For ten minutes you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet and learn the school of any visible aura.

name: Identify
description: You learn the properties, command words, charges, and attunement requirements of a magic item or spell effect you touch.

name: Detect Thoughts
description: You focus on a creature within 30 feet to read its surface thoughts and can probe deeper with a Wisdom save.

name: Suggestion
description: You magically influence a creature with a reasonable command that lasts up to eight hours if it fails a Wisdom save.

name: Misty Step
description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see as a bonus action.

name: Counterspell
description: You interrupt a creature casting a spell; if it is 3rd level or lower it fails, otherwise make an ability check.

name: Dispel Magic
description: Choose one creature or object; spells of 3rd level or lower end automatically, higher-level spells require a check.

name: Fly
description: A willing creature gains a flying speed of 60 feet for ten minutes while concentration lasts.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A stroke of lightning forms a 100-foot line that deals 8d6 lightning damage to creatures that fail a Dexterity save.

name: Cone of Cold
description: A frigid blast erupts in a 60-foot cone, dealing 8d8 cold damage or half on a successful Constitution save.

name: Wish
description: You reshape reality, duplicating lower-level spells without components or producing powerful effects at great risk.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: Four blazing spheres rain destruction, each exploding for 20d6 fire and 20d6 bludgeoning damage in 40-foot bursts.

name: Revivify
description: You touch a creature that died within the last minute to restore it to life with 1 hit point.

name: Raise Dead
description: You return a creature dead no longer than ten days to life with reduced hit points and lingering penalties.

name: Resurrection
description: A creature dead up to a century is restored to life with full hit points after a lengthy casting ritual.

name: True Resurrection
description: You bring a creature back to life regardless of how long it has been dead, provided some part of it remains.

name: Time Stop
description: You briefly stop time for everyone but yourself, taking up to 1d4 + 1 extra turns while attackers are frozen.

name: Polymorph
description: A creature transforms into a beast form of CR equal to its level while the spell lasts or until its new form drops to 0 HP.

name: Disintegrate
description: A thin green ray deals 10d6 + 40 force damage, disintegrating targets reduced to 0 hit points.

name: Banishment
description: You send a creature to a harmless demiplane or back to its native plane if it fails a Charisma save.

name: Invisibility
description: A creature you touch becomes invisible for up to an hour until it attacks or casts a spell.

name: Greater Invisibility
description: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible even while attacking or casting for up to one minute.

name: Animate Dead
description: You raise a corpse or pile of bones as a skeleton or zombie under your control for 24 hours.

name: Wall of Force
description: An invisible wall of force appears in a shape you choose, immune to damage and only dispelled by disintegrate.

name: Wall of Fire
description: You create a wall of roaring flames dealing 5d8 fire damage to creatures ending their turn within 10 feet of one side.

name: Wall of Stone
description: A six-inch-thick wall of stone springs into existence and can become permanent if you concentrate for the full duration.

name: Teleport
description: You and up to eight willing creatures instantly travel to a familiar location with a mishap chance for unknown circles.

name: Teleportation Circle
description: You draw a sigil on the floor forming a permanent teleport circle if cast in the same spot every day for a year.

name: Dimension Door
description: You teleport yourself and one willing creature within 500 feet to a location you can visualize or describe.

name: Shield of Faith
description: A shimmering field surrounds a creature of your choice, granting +2 AC for the duration.

name: Guiding Bolt
description: A flash of light deals 4d6 radiant damage and gives the next attack advantage against the target.

name: Inflict Wounds
description: Make a melee spell attack that deals 3d10 necrotic damage, scaling with higher spell slots.

name: Prayer of Healing
description: After ten minutes you heal up to six creatures for 2d8 + modifier hit points.

name: Beacon of Hope
description: You grant up to three creatures advantage on Wisdom saves and death saves while all healing restores the maximum possible.

name: Death Ward
description: You touch a creature to grant it a one-time protection from death or instant stabilization.

name: Heroes' Feast
description: You conjure a magnificent feast that cures diseases, grants immunity to poison, and boosts hit points for 24 hours.

name: Detect Evil and Good
description: For ten minutes you sense aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead within 30 feet.

name: Protection from Evil and Good
description: A willing creature gains protection from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead imposing disadvantage on attacks.

name: Magic Weapon
description: A nonmagical weapon becomes a +1 magical weapon (higher bonus at higher slots) for the duration.

name: Stoneskin
description: You toughen a willing creature's flesh, granting resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

name: Barkskin
description: A target's skin becomes as tough as bark, setting its AC to 16 while the spell lasts.

name: Call Lightning
description: A storm cloud forms overhead letting you call down bolts that deal 3d10 lightning damage each round.

name: Conjure Animals
description: You summon fey spirits that take beast shapes such as wolves or giant eagles to fight for you.

name: Conjure Woodland Beings
description: You summon fey creatures of CR 2 or lower that obey your verbal commands for up to one hour.

name: Spike Growth
description: The ground erupts with spikes; creatures moving through take 2d4 piercing damage for every 5 feet traveled.

name: Plant Growth
description: You cause vegetation to overgrow, either enriching a wide area or creating difficult terrain in a 100-foot radius.

name: Wind Wall
description: A wall of powerful wind rises to deflect arrows, small flying creatures, and gases while dealing 3d8 bludgeoning damage.

name: Flame Blade
description: A fiery scimitar appears in your hand dealing 3d6 fire damage on a hit and shedding bright light.

name: Flaming Sphere
description: A five-foot-diameter sphere of fire rolls around burning creatures for 2d6 fire damage on failed saves.

name: Heat Metal
description: Choose a manufactured metal object; it glows red hot dealing 2d8 fire damage and forcing creatures to drop it.

name: Ice Storm
description: Hailstones batter a 20-foot radius, dealing bludgeoning and cold damage while turning the area into difficult terrain.

name: Cloudkill
description: You create a moving cloud of poisonous fog that heavily obscures and deals 5d8 poison damage each round.

name: Acid Arrow
description: A shimmering green arrow deals 4d4 acid damage on a hit plus 2d4 damage at the end of the target's next turn.

name: Scorching Ray
description: You create three rays of fire making ranged spell attacks for 2d6 fire damage each.

name: Burning Hands
description: A sheet of flames shoots from your hands dealing 3d6 fire damage in a 15-foot cone, or half on a save.

name: Charm Person
description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see; if it fails a Wisdom save it regards you as a friendly acquaintance.

name: Hold Monster
description: Choose a creature which must succeed on a Wisdom save or be paralyzed for the duration.

name: Slow
description: Up to six creatures must make Wisdom saves or have halved speed, -2 AC, and limited actions.

name: Confusion
description: Each creature in a 10-foot sphere makes a Wisdom save or acts unpredictably each turn.

name: Dominate Person
description: You charm a humanoid for up to one minute, directing its actions each round with telepathic commands.

name: Dominate Monster
description: A creature of your choice must succeed on a Wisdom save or fall completely under your control.

name: Feeblemind
description: You blast a creature's mind, dealing 4d6 psychic damage and reducing its Intelligence and Charisma to 1 on a failed save.

name: Heroism
description: A willing creature is immune to being frightened and gains temporary hit points each round while the spell lasts.

name: Aid
description: You bolster up to three creatures, increasing their hit point maximum and current hit points by 5 for eight hours.

name: Darkvision
description: A willing creature can see in darkness as if it were dim light out to 60 feet for eight hours.

name: Water Breathing
description: Up to ten willing creatures can breathe underwater for 24 hours while retaining their normal movement.

name: Water Walk
description: Up to ten creatures can move across liquid surfaces as if solid for one hour.

name: Freedom of Movement
description: A target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain and cannot be paralyzed or restrained by magic.

name: Stone Shape
description: You form stone into any shape that suits your purpose such as a door, idol, or small passageway.

name: Planar Binding
description: You attempt to bind a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to your service for up to 24 hours or longer at higher slots.

name: Plane Shift
description: You and up to eight willing creatures travel to another plane of existence using a tuning fork keyed to the destination.

name: Mass Heal
description: A wave of healing energy restores up to 700 hit points, divided as you choose among creatures in range.

name: Heal
description: Choose a creature to regain 70 hit points and end blindness, deafness, and diseases afflicting it.

name: Regenerate
description: You touch a creature granting 4d8 + 15 hit points immediately and 1 hit point per turn while lost limbs regrow.

name: Lesser Restoration
description: Touch a creature to end one disease or condition such as blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

name: Greater Restoration
description: You imbue a creature with positive energy to end charmed, petrified, curses, ability score reductions, or exhaustion levels.

name: Remove Curse
description: At your touch all curses affecting a creature or object end, and cursed magic items lose their attunement.

name: Blur
description: Your body becomes blurred, causing attackers to have disadvantage on melee and ranged weapon attacks against you.

name: Mirror Image
description: Three illusory duplicates appear around you, forcing attackers to potentially hit the duplicates instead.
